Package com.soa.security.spi

Interface Summary
ExtensibleSecurityModuleProvider This represents a ISecurityModuleProvider that supports additional security capabilities beyond authentication, authorization and identity browsing.
IConfigConstants Constant definition for attribute names in IProviderConfigContext.
IdentityProfileProvider This is the SPI interface to create a Identity from a Identity profile.
IIdentitySystemService This class provides meta data information about Identity System.
IProfileConfig  
IProviderConfigContext This class provides the context for configurating SecurityProvider.
ISecurityModuleProvider This is the provider interface for security module plugin.
ISecurityModuleProviderFactory This is a factory class to create a ISecurityModuleProvider
 

Class Summary
IdentityProfileSubjectMetaData This class represents the MetaData of a Profile Subject
ProviderConfigConstants  
 

Exception Summary
InvalidConfigurationException
